 UFO Geek lives like an hour drive to the south of me, calls himslef a 'Gh=
ost Boxologist', yet seemingly shuns contact from the 'Ghost Box master'--w=
ierd.   I know I can come across as a total dork on e-mail, but that's can =
be deceiving. Or-perhaps being a The Princess, some fear gayness, which I a=
in't even though girliness is difficult to completely mask. 
 
 I'm guessin=
g there's some fear of repercussings for making boxes, but I have often sta=
ted there are many ways to do this stuff, as well as different methods to u=
se raw audio, such as white noise, DRV, running water, EVPmaker or foreign =
language--IT'S ALL THE SAME! The concept is the same, provide something for=
 entities to form voices out of and they will speak. I am also not the only=
 "one from the stars" here, many of us have these dual--or more--personalit=
ies.  Ya never really know who you are talking to. I also don't jump on the=
 usual paranormal BS everyone else repeats-endlessly. Most of that stuff is=
 urban myth and legend passed off as facts. Now, I'm felling really far beh=
ind, since I don't even have a podcast!   Just a thought--of course, that's=
 working without tools again. I mean I can be brain dead, it never occured =
to me to use other digital radios until the hack boxes came out, and it was=
 like DAH! Which lead to improvements in sound quality. I have to use pre-m=
ade radios since my home radios are C-R-A-P-P-Y! Another reason why I can't=
 mass produce this junk. 
 
 I know it really pisses people off by the way =
I give some of the boxes out, but I can't make many--so I have to go on int=
uition-sorta kinda- as to who gets them. It seems the boxes just don't work=
 for everyone, so deciding who gets it is difficult. 
 
 The antenna shield=
 is only maybe a half dozen turns of solid wire over the end of the AM rod =
antenna--loosly over the antenna coil,  then the other end of the wire is g=
rounded through a switch. The end of the extra wire on the antenna rod is l=
eft un-connected to anything. 
 
 Frank-S
